header.title: Our Projects
header.subtitle: Explore our portfolio of professional websites, mobile apps, desktop software, and AI-powered solutions that have helped businesses transform digitally.

projects.title: AlkoCars – Car Selling & Importing Platform
projects.description: Full-stack web application for selling cars and importing them from South Korea to Algeria. Includes a complete Admin Dashboard with overview analytics, cars/brands/payments/finance/transactions management and a PDF document generator for contracts, invoices and reservation papers.

projects.title: MK Exports
projects.description: Official website for MK Exports, an Algerian company specializing in exporting local products to global markets.

projects.title: Bayti
projects.description: Real estate platform connecting buyers and sellers in the Algerian market with virtual tours and real-time updates.

projects.title: QuickMenu
projects.description: Web application for creating and managing meal plans with personalized recipe suggestions.

projects.title: Hammam POS Desktop App
projects.description: Desktop point-of-sale system built for a Hammam. Features stock, client and worker management, plus safe-key management for locker keys. Designed for POS machines with a clean and fast UI/UX.

projects.title: SmartStock
projects.description: IoT-based inventory management system for automated stock tracking and alerts.

projects.title: Prepanova Website
projects.description: Web platform providing study tools and resources for students.

projects.title: ENSTA Cloud
projects.description: Internal cloud platform for file-sharing and collaboration among students.

projects.title: MedFlow
projects.description: Healthcare management system simplifying patient data organization and appointments.

projects.title: MedApp
projects.description: Flutter app for managing hospitals, clinics and pharmacies with real-time queue counters and prescription scanning.

projects.title: Your Space
projects.description: An astronomy educational app using NASA APIs with real-time space data and 3D Earth animation.

projects.title: Restu App
projects.description: A restaurant ordering system where Flutter is used on mobile by waiters and connected to a desktop C# app via Firebase for kitchen management.

projects.title: Employee Management System
projects.description: A desktop HR tool built with C# and SQL to manage employee records, attendance, and salaries.

projects.title: Mail Auto Responder
projects.description: An automated email reply system using scripting and logic to simulate smart contextual responses.

projects.title: Telegram Show Recommender Bot
projects.description: A Telegram bot that suggests TV shows using content filtering and genre preferences.

hero.title: About AD-Newtech
hero.subtitle: We are a specialized tech team dedicated to delivering modern, efficient, and innovative digital solutions for businesses of all sizes.

overview.title: What We Do
overview.description: AD-Newtech specializes in building cutting-edge web applications, mobile apps, desktop software, and AI-powered solutions. We focus on quality, efficiency, and innovation to help businesses transform their digital presence and streamline their operations.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower businesses with state-of-the-art technology solutions that drive growth, enhance productivity, and create lasting value.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the trusted partner for companies seeking modern, scalable, and secure software solutions that transform their business operations.

roles.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
roles.description: Expert in building responsive, high-performance web applications using React, Next.js, Node.js, and modern cloud technologies.

roles.title: Mobile & Desktop Developer
roles.description: Specializing in cross-platform mobile apps and desktop software using Flutter, React Native, and Electron for seamless user experiences.

roles.title: AI & Automation Engineer
roles.description: Developing intelligent automation solutions, AI agents, and machine learning models to optimize business processes and decision-making.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose AD-Newtech?
reasons: Small, specialized team ensures fast delivery and personalized attention
Expertise in modern technologies and best practices
Transparent communication throughout the project lifecycle
Scalable and secure solutions built to grow with your business
Commitment to quality and long-term partnerships
Flexible and adaptive to your unique requirements
